description: Implement all 2026 UI/UX best practices across design system, layout, interactions, accessibility, and performance

steps.name: Design System Foundation
steps.description: Implement design tokens and base styling improvements
tasks: Apply 60-30-10 color rule to brand colors
Implement 8-point grid spacing system in Tailwind config
Add Plus Jakarta Sans font (or evaluate alternatives)
Create consistent button variants (primary, secondary, ghost)
Create consistent card variants with hover states
Create form input variants with validation states

steps.name: Layout Improvements
steps.description: Enhance page layouts with bento grids and better spacing
tasks: Implement bento grid component for feature showcases
Update section spacing to 80-120px vertical padding
Add Container component for max-width consistency

steps.name: Interactive Elements
steps.description: Enhance buttons, cards, and forms with micro-interactions
tasks: Add loading states for async actions
Add error states with helpful messages

steps.name: Accessibility Enhancements
steps.description: Achieve WCAG 2.2 AA compliance across all components
tasks: Fix color contrast ratios to 4.5:1 minimum
Add ARIA labels to all interactive elements
Implement keyboard navigation for all features
Use semantic HTML (header, nav, main, section, footer)
outputs: Visible focus states on all interactive elements

steps.name: Performance Optimization
steps.description: Optimize Core Web Vitals and reduce bundle size
tasks: Optimize Framer Motion animations (use transforms, not layout properties)
Compress images and use WebP format with fallbacks

steps.name: Conversion Optimization
steps.description: Improve CTAs and forms for better conversion

checkpoint.name: Implementation Complete
verification_steps: Bento grids and proper spacing in place

on_failure.escalate_if: Cannot meet accessibility or performance targets
on_failure.fallback: Document blockers and request human guidance
